title: 08/08 Fantasy Football Podcast: Quarterbacks Preview
description:
It's finally time to start breaking down the positions. We begin with the deepest position in Fantasy and give our general strategies (2:10), adjustments in different formats like PPR, 4-point per TD, auctions and 2-QB leagues (11:50), plus sleepers, breakouts and busts (23:50) ... A complete review of QB average draft position! Can Andrew Luck be the #1 QB again (31:00)? Any concerns about Drew Brees this year (39:00)? Breakout potential for Marcus Mariota, Jameis Winston and Derek Carr and why some of us are low on Dak Prescott and Cam Newton (50:00) ... Best late-round picks at the position (55:00), plus some Team Name Tuesday! ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
